## DOMAspect variable

The type of HTML aspect to target.

**Signature:**

```typescript
DOMAspect: Readonly<{
    readonly none: 0;
    readonly attribute: 1;
    readonly booleanAttribute: 2;
    readonly property: 3;
    readonly content: 4;
    readonly tokenList: 5;
    readonly event: 6;
}>
```
